comment: Darth Manager never explains his plans clearly. I'm always left in the dark.
Cruella is fashion-forward and always keeps the office looking stylish. A bit obsessed with Dalmatian patterns, though.
Working with Joker is a blast! He brings chaos to the workplace, but in a fun way. Never a dull moment.
Maleficent Manager has a knack for dramatic entrances, but her leadership style is a bit too 'sleeping beauty' for my taste.
Lex Luthorious is all about world domination, but he can't even manage a team meeting properly. Total chaos!
Hannibal Boss always organizes the best potlucks. His taste in food is simply to die for.
Cthulhu Chief might be ancient and unknowable, but surprisingly great at team-building exercises. Just avoid eye contact.
Captain Hook Manager is obsessed with his hand. It's distracting during code reviews, and he's always looking for it!
